00031 
00037 #ifndef EGS_MATH_
00038 #define EGS_MATH_
00039 
00040 #ifdef MISSING
00041     #include "missing.h"
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #ifdef NO_CMATH
00045     #include <math.h>
00046 #else
00047     #include <cmath>
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 // M_PI is not defined after including cmath for the MS visual studio compiler?
00051 #ifndef M_PI
00052     #define M_PI 3.14159265358979323846
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 // Some C++ compilers don't have a proper implementation of abs() for
00056 // all types => use a macro instead.
00057 #ifdef DONT_HAVE_ABS
00058     #ifdef abs
00059         #undef abs
00060     #endif
00061     #define abs(a)     ((a) >= 0  ? (a) : -(a))
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 // Some C++ compilers don't know anything about min/max after including
00065 // cmath.
00066 #ifdef DONT_HAVE_MINMAX
00067     #ifdef min
00068         #undef min
00069     #endif
00070     #ifdef max
00071         #undef max
00072     #endif
00073     #define  max(a, b)  ((a) > (b) ? (a) :  (b))
00074     #define  min(a, b)  ((a) < (b) ? (a) :  (b))
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 // this one is needed for the SGI C++ compiler.
00078 #ifdef STD_SQRT
00079     #define sqrt(a) std::sqrt(a)
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #endif
